char_a.NAME: Robin Aster
char_a.APPEARANCE: Short, vibrant purple hair, dazzling smile, androgynous features with bright eyes, wears a mix of clothes that express their unique style (masculine, feminine, both).
char_a.LIKES: Experimenting with floral arrangements, creating beauty with nature's bounty, seeing the joy flowers bring to people.
char_a.HOBBIES: Hiking, learning about different plant life, volunteering at a community garden.
char_a.SUMMARY: A creative and free-spirited florist with a passion for transforming flowers into stunning works of art. Robin's infectious enthusiasm and love for nature will brighten your day.

char_b.NAME: Samira Hassan
char_b.APPEARANCE: Short, neatly trimmed silver hair, warm and inviting smile, wears comfortable clothing with a focus on cultural elements (e.g., scarves, jewelry).
char_b.LIKES: Exploring the vastness of space, learning about the universe's mysteries, sharing their knowledge with others.
char_b.DISLIKES: Ignorance, closed-mindedness, the idea that anything is impossible
char_b.HOBBIES: Stargazing, attending astronomy lectures, writing about their research in a captivating way.
char_b.SUMMARY: A brilliant and curious astronomer with a passion for unraveling the secrets of the cosmos. Samira's infectious wonder and thirst for knowledge will inspire you to dream big.

game_instances.initial_prompt_player_a:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will start the conversation.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation in case you are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal.

Your answer has to include the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] State if you agree or not agree with the proposal. [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]


The game ends when you either run out of turn to communicate, you do not follow the template, or if you both agree to a proposal.

char_a.NAME: Riley Jones
char_a.APPEARANCE: Buzz cut, warm hazel eyes, androgynous build with toned muscles, wears comfortable yet stylish clothing.
char_a.LIKES: The rhythm of forging metal, creating functional art, working with their hands.
char_a.DISLIKES: Idleness, pretentiousness, following the rules just for the sake of it.
char_a.HOBBIES: Sculpting metal into art pieces, weightlifting, historical reenactment.
char_a.SUMMARY: A strong and independent blacksmith with a passion for transforming raw materials into beauty. Riley's dedication and down-to-earth personality will inspire you to embrace your own inner strength.

char_a.NAME: Chloe Kim
char_a.APPEARANCE: Confident smirk, bright green eyes, athletic build, wears comfortable clothes with a sporty flair.
char_a.OCCUPATION: Lead Mechanic at a Motorcycle Repair Shop
char_a.LIKES: Fixing things with her own hands, the roar of a motorcycle engine, a good challenge.
char_a.DISLIKES: Idleness, people who give up easily, following the crowd.
char_a.HOBBIES: Motocross racing (competitively), tinkering with old machines, participating in hackathons.
char_a.SUMMARY: A fearless and independent mechanic who thrives on a good challenge. Chloe's confident attitude and adventurous spirit will make you want to break free from the ordinary.

char_b.NAME: Jamie Park
char_b.APPEARANCE: Vibrant dyed hair (changes color often), bright and expressive eyes, wears bold and trendy clothing that reflects their artistic personality.
char_b.LIKES: Creating meaningful and personalized tattoos, expressing their artistic vision, connecting with people through their work.
char_b.HOBBIES: Painting, attending art festivals, experimenting with different artistic mediums.
char_b.SUMMARY: A passionate and artistic tattoo artist who uses their craft to tell stories and express individuality. Jamie's vibrant personality and artistic vision will inspire you to embrace your own unique voice.

game_instances.initial_prompt_player_b:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will be approached by the other player.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation in case you are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal.

Your answer has to include the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] State if you agree or not agree with the proposal. [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

The game ends when you either run out of turn to communicate, you do not follow the template, or if you both agree to a proposal.

char_a.NAME: Hiro Suzuki
char_a.APPEARANCE: Bright blue hair (dyed), energetic eyes, playful grin, wears trendy clothes.
char_a.LIKES: Gaming, sharing his passion with his viewers, pushing his limits.
char_a.HOBBIES: Exercising, attending gaming conventions, trying out new games.
char_a.SUMMARY: A vibrant and enthusiastic esports player with a loyal fanbase. Hiro's infectious positivity and competitive spirit will draw you into the exciting world of gaming.

char_b.NAME: Ethan Moore
char_b.APPEARANCE: Salt and pepper hair, warm smile, crinkled eyes when he laughs, wears well-fitting suits.
char_b.LIKES: Engaging discussions, classic literature, a good cup of tea.
char_b.HOBBIES: Reading, attending plays and concerts, spending time in nature.
char_b.SUMMARY: A sophisticated and well-spoken professor with a passion for the written word. Ethan's insightful mind and gentle demeanor will make you see the beauty hidden within literature.
